bio: I am a passionate Bangladeshi chef with over a decade of experience in crafting traditional and fusion cuisine. My culinary journey is dedicated to showcasing the rich flavors of Bangladesh, blending them with innovative techniques. Committed to excellence, I bring authentic taste and modern flair to every dish.
